00054 #if SC_CPLUSPLUS >= 201103L // use C++11 for type traits
00055   using std::enable_if;
00056   using std::remove_const;
00057   using std::is_same;
00058   using std::is_const;
00059 
00060 # define SC_STATIC_CONSTANT_(Type,Value) \
00061     static const Type Value
00062 
00063 #else // use Boost/local implementation for type traits
00064   template<bool Cond, typename T = void>
00065   struct enable_if : sc_boost::enable_if_c<Cond, T> {};
00066 
00067 # define SC_STATIC_CONSTANT_(Type,Value) \
00068     SC_BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(Type,Value)
00069 
00070   // simplistic version to reduce Boost usage
00071   template< typename T > struct remove_const          { typedef T type; };
00072   template< typename T > struct remove_const<const T> { typedef T type; };
00073 
00074   template< typename T, typename U >
00075   struct is_same      { SC_BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT( bool, value = false ); };
00076   template< typename T >
00077   struct is_same<T,T> { SC_BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT( bool, value = true );  };
00078 
00079   template< typename T >
00080   struct is_const           { SC_BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT( bool, value = false ); };
00081   template< typename T >
00082   struct is_const< const T> { SC_BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT( bool, value = true );  };
00083 
00084 #endif // type traits
00085 
00086   template< typename CT, typename T >
00087   struct is_more_const {
00088     SC_STATIC_CONSTANT_( bool, value
00089        = ( is_same< typename remove_const<CT>::type
00090                  , typename remove_const<T>::type
00091                  >::value
00092           && ( is_const<CT>::value >= is_const<T>::value ) ) );
00093   };
00094 
00095   struct special_result {};
00096   template< typename T > struct remove_special_fptr {};
00097   template< typename T > 
00098   struct remove_special_fptr< special_result& (*)( T ) >
00099     { typedef T type; };
00100 
00101 #define SC_RPTYPE_(Type)                                   \
00102   ::sc_core::sc_meta::remove_special_fptr         \
00103     < ::sc_core::sc_meta::special_result& (*) Type >::type::value
00104 
00105 #define SC_ENABLE_IF_( Cond )                              \
00106   typename ::sc_core::sc_meta::enable_if                   \
00107     < SC_RPTYPE_(Cond) >::type * = NULL
00108

00134 class SC_API sc_vector_base
00135   : public sc_object
00136 {
00137 
00138   template<typename,typename> friend class sc_vector_assembly;
00139   template<typename,typename> friend class sc_vector_iter;
00140 
00141 public:
00142 
00143   typedef sc_vector_element*            handle_type;
00144   typedef std::vector< handle_type >    storage_type;
00145   typedef storage_type::size_type       size_type;
00146   typedef storage_type::difference_type difference_type;
00147 
00148   const char * kind() const { return "sc_vector"; }
00149 
00150   std::vector<sc_object*> const & get_elements() const;
00151 
00152   size_type size() const
00153     { return vec_.size(); }
00154 
00155 protected:
00156 
00157   // begin implementation defined
00158 
00159   typedef storage_type::iterator        iterator;
00160   typedef storage_type::const_iterator  const_iterator;
00161 
00162   sc_vector_base();
00163 
00164   sc_vector_base( const char* prefix )
00165     : sc_object( prefix )
00166     , vec_()
00167     , objs_vec_(0)
00168   {}
00169 
00170   ~sc_vector_base()
00171     { delete objs_vec_; }
00172 
00173   void * at( size_type i )
00174     { return vec_[i]; }
00175 
00176   void const * at( size_type i ) const
00177     { return vec_[i]; }
00178 
00179   void reserve( size_type n )
00180     { vec_.reserve(n); }
00181 
00182   void clear()
00183     { vec_.clear(); }
00184 
00185   void push_back( void* item )
00186     { vec_.push_back( static_cast<handle_type>(item) ); }
00187 
00188   void check_index( size_type i ) const;
00189   bool check_init( size_type n )  const;
00190 
00191   static std::string make_name( const char* prefix, size_type index );
00192 
00193   iterator begin() { return vec_.begin(); }
00194   iterator end()   { return vec_.end();   }
00195 
00196   const_iterator begin() const { return vec_.begin(); }
00197   const_iterator end()   const { return vec_.end();   }
00198 
00199   virtual sc_object* object_cast( void* ) const = 0;
00200 
00201   sc_object* implicit_cast( sc_object* p ) const { return p; }
00202   sc_object* implicit_cast( ... /* incompatible */ )  const;
00203

00205   {
00206     sc_vector_base* owner_;
00207   public:
00208     explicit context_scope(sc_vector_base* owner);
00209     ~context_scope();
00210   };

00213   void report_empty_bind( const char* kind_, bool dst_range_ ) const;

00225 // iterator access adapters
00226 template< typename ElementType >
00227 struct sc_direct_access
00228 {
00229   typedef ElementType  element_type;
00230   typedef element_type type;
00231   typedef typename sc_meta::remove_const<type>::type plain_type;
00232 
00233   typedef sc_direct_access< type >             policy;
00234   typedef sc_direct_access< plain_type >       non_const_policy;
00235   typedef sc_direct_access< const plain_type > const_policy;
00236 
00237   sc_direct_access(){}
00238   sc_direct_access( const non_const_policy& ) {}
00239   // convert from any policy to (const) direct policy
00240   template<typename U>
00241   sc_direct_access( const U&
00242     , SC_ENABLE_IF_((
00243         sc_meta::is_more_const<type,typename U::policy::element_type>
00244     )) )
00245   {}
00246 
00247   type* get( type* this_ ) const
00248     { return this_; }
00249 };
00250 
00251 // iterator access adapters
00252 template< typename ElementType
00253         , typename AccessType   >
00254 class sc_member_access
00255 {
00256   public:
00257     template< typename, typename > friend class sc_member_access;
00258 
00259     typedef ElementType element_type;
00260     typedef AccessType  access_type;
00261     typedef access_type (ElementType::*member_type);
00262     typedef access_type type;
00263     typedef typename sc_meta::remove_const<type>::type plain_type;
00264     typedef typename sc_meta::remove_const<ElementType>::type plain_elem_type;
00265 
00266     typedef sc_member_access< element_type, access_type > policy;
00267     typedef sc_member_access< plain_elem_type, plain_type >
00268       non_const_policy;
00269     typedef sc_member_access< const plain_elem_type, const plain_type >
00270       const_policy;
00271   
00272     sc_member_access( member_type ptr )
00273       : ptr_(ptr) {}
00274   
00275     sc_member_access( const non_const_policy& other )
00276       : ptr_(other.ptr_)
00277     {}
00278   
00279     access_type * get( element_type* this_ ) const
00280       { return &(this_->*ptr_); }
00281   
00282   private:
00283     member_type ptr_;
00284 }; // sc_member_access
00285   
00286 
00287 template< typename ElementType
00288         , typename AccessPolicy = sc_direct_access<ElementType> >
00289 class sc_vector_iter
00290   : private AccessPolicy
00291 {
00292   typedef ElementType  element_type;
00293   typedef typename AccessPolicy::policy            access_policy;
00294   typedef typename AccessPolicy::non_const_policy  non_const_policy;
00295   typedef typename AccessPolicy::const_policy      const_policy;
00296 
00297   typedef typename sc_meta::remove_const<ElementType>::type plain_type;
00298   typedef const plain_type                                  const_plain_type;
00299   typedef typename sc_direct_access<plain_type>::const_policy
00300     const_direct_policy;
00301 
00302   friend class sc_vector< plain_type >;
00303   template< typename, typename > friend class sc_vector_assembly;
00304   template< typename, typename > friend class sc_vector_iter;
00305 
00306   typedef sc_vector_iter               this_type;
00307   typedef sc_vector<plain_type>        vector_type;
00308   typedef sc_vector_base::storage_type storage_type;
00309 
00310   // select correct base-type iterator
00311   template< typename U > struct select_iter
00312     { typedef typename storage_type::iterator       type; };
00313   template< typename U > struct select_iter< const U >
00314     { typedef typename storage_type::const_iterator type; };
00315 
00316   typedef typename select_iter<ElementType>::type          raw_iterator;
00317   typedef sc_vector_iter< const_plain_type, const_policy > const_iterator;
00318   typedef sc_vector_iter< const_plain_type, const_direct_policy >
00319     const_direct_iterator;
00320 
00321   // underlying vector iterator
00322 
00323   raw_iterator it_;
00324 
00325   sc_vector_iter( raw_iterator it, access_policy acc = access_policy() )
00326     : access_policy(acc), it_(it) {}
00327 
00328   access_policy const & get_policy() const { return *this; }
00329 
00330 public:
00331   // interface for Random Access Iterator category,
00332   // see ISO/IEC 14882:2003(E), 24.1 [lib.iterator.requirements]
00333 
00334   typedef std::random_access_iterator_tag iterator_category;
00335   typedef std::ptrdiff_t                  difference_type;
00336   typedef typename access_policy::type    value_type;
00337   typedef value_type &                    reference;
00338   typedef value_type *                    pointer;
00339 
00340   sc_vector_iter() : access_policy(), it_() {}
00341 
00342   // iterator conversions to more const, and/or direct iterators
00343   //
00344   // Note: There is a minor risk to match unrelated classes (i.e. not sc_vector_iter<T,POL>),
00345   //       but MSVC 2005 does not correctly consider a restricted conversion constructor
00346   //       sc_vector_iter( const sc_vector_iter<OtherType,OtherPolicy>, SC_ENABLE_IF_ ...).
00347   //       To reduce this risk, the types used in the enable-if condition could be further
00348   //       tailored towards sc_vector(_iter), should the need arise.
00349   //
00350   // See also: sc_direct_access conversion constructor
00351   template< typename It >
00352   sc_vector_iter( const It& it
00353     , SC_ENABLE_IF_((
00354         sc_meta::is_more_const< element_type
00355                               , typename It::policy::element_type >
00356       )) )
00357     : access_policy( it.get_policy() ), it_( it.it_ )
00358   {}
00359 
00360   // step
00361   this_type& operator++(){ ++it_; return *this; }
00362   this_type& operator--(){ --it_; return *this; }
00363   this_type  operator++(int){ this_type old(*this); ++it_; return old; }
00364   this_type  operator--(int){ this_type old(*this); --it_; return old; }
00365 
00366   // advance
00367   this_type  operator+( difference_type n ) const
00368     { return this_type( it_ + n, get_policy()); }
00369   this_type  operator-( difference_type n ) const
00370     { return this_type( it_ - n, get_policy()); }
00371 
00372   this_type& operator+=( difference_type n ) { it_+=n; return *this; }
00373   this_type& operator-=( difference_type n ) { it_-=n; return *this; }
00374 
00375   // relations
00376   bool operator==( const const_direct_iterator& that ) const
00377     { return it_ == that.it_; }
00378   bool operator!=( const const_direct_iterator& that ) const
00379     { return it_ != that.it_; }
00380   bool operator<=( const const_direct_iterator& that ) const
00381     { return it_ <= that.it_; }
00382   bool operator>=( const const_direct_iterator& that ) const
00383     { return it_ >= that.it_; }
00384   bool operator< ( const const_direct_iterator& that ) const
00385     { return it_ < that.it_; }
00386   bool operator> ( const const_direct_iterator& that ) const
00387     { return it_ > that.it_; }
00388 
00389   // dereference
00390   reference operator*() const
00391     { return *access_policy::get( static_cast<element_type*>((void*)*it_) ); }
00392   pointer   operator->() const
00393     { return access_policy::get( static_cast<element_type*>((void*)*it_) ); }
00394   reference operator[]( difference_type n ) const
00395     { return *access_policy::get( static_cast<element_type*>((void*)it_[n]) ); }
00396 
00397   // distance
00398   difference_type operator-( const_direct_iterator const& that ) const
00399     { return it_-that.it_; }
00400 
00401 }; // sc_vector_iter
00402 
00403 template< typename T >
00404 class sc_vector
00405   : public sc_vector_base
00406 {
00407   typedef sc_vector_base base_type;
00408   typedef sc_vector<T>   this_type;
00409 
00410 public:
00411   typedef T element_type;
00412   typedef sc_vector_iter< element_type >       iterator;
00413   typedef sc_vector_iter< const element_type > const_iterator;
00414 
00415   sc_vector(){}
00416 
00417   explicit sc_vector( const char* prefix )
00418     : base_type( prefix )
00419   {}
00420 
00421   explicit sc_vector( const char* prefix, size_type n )
00422     : base_type( prefix )
00423     { init(n); }
00424 
00425   template< typename Creator >
00426   sc_vector( const char* prefix, size_type n, Creator creator )
00427     : base_type( prefix )
00428   {
00429     init( n, creator );
00430   }
00431 
00432   virtual ~sc_vector();
00433 
00434   element_type& operator[]( size_type i )
00435     { return *static_cast<element_type*>( base_type::at(i) ); }
00436 
00437   element_type& at( size_type i )
00438     { check_index(i); return (*this)[i]; }
00439 
00440   const element_type& operator[]( size_type i ) const
00441     { return *static_cast<element_type const *>( base_type::at(i) ); }
00442 
00443   const element_type& at( size_type i ) const
00444     { check_index(i); return (*this)[i]; }
00445 
00446   void init( size_type n )
00447     { init( n, &this_type::create_element ); }
00448 
00449   template< typename Creator >
00450   void init( size_type n, Creator c );
00451 
00452   static element_type * create_element( const char* prefix, size_type index );
00453 
00454   iterator begin() { return base_type::begin(); }
00455   iterator end()   { return base_type::end();   }
00456 
00457   const_iterator begin()  const { return base_type::begin(); }
00458   const_iterator end()    const { return base_type::end(); }
00459 
00460   const_iterator cbegin() const { return base_type::begin(); }
00461   const_iterator cend()   const { return base_type::end(); }
00462 
00463   template< typename ContainerType, typename ArgumentType >
00464   iterator bind( sc_vector_assembly<ContainerType,ArgumentType> c )
00465     { return bind( c.begin(), c.end() ); }
00466 
00467   template< typename BindableContainer >
00468   iterator bind( BindableContainer & c )
00469     { return bind( c.begin(), c.end() ); }
00470 
00471   template< typename BindableIterator >
00472   iterator bind( BindableIterator first, BindableIterator last )
00473     { return bind( first, last, this->begin() ); }
00474 
00475   template< typename BindableIterator >
00476   iterator bind( BindableIterator first, BindableIterator last
00477                , iterator from )
00478     { return sc_vector_do_bind( *this, first, last, from ); }
00479 
00480   template< typename ContainerType, typename ArgumentType >
00481   iterator operator()( sc_vector_assembly<ContainerType,ArgumentType> c )
00482     { return operator()( c.begin(), c.end() ); }
00483 
00484   template< typename ArgumentContainer >
00485   iterator operator()( ArgumentContainer & c )
00486     { return operator()( c.begin(), c.end() ); }
00487 
00488   template< typename ArgumentIterator >
00489   iterator operator()( ArgumentIterator first, ArgumentIterator last )
00490     { return operator()( first, last, this->begin() ); }
00491 
00492   template< typename ArgumentIterator >
00493   iterator operator()( ArgumentIterator first, ArgumentIterator last
00494                      , iterator from )
00495     { return sc_vector_do_operator_paren( *this, first, last, from ); }
00496 
00497   // member-wise access
00498 
00499   template< typename MT >
00500   sc_vector_assembly<T,MT> assemble( MT (T::*member_ptr) )
00501     { return sc_vector_assembly<T,MT>( *this, member_ptr ); }
00502 
00503 protected:
00504 
00505   void clear();
00506 
00507   virtual sc_object* object_cast( void* p ) const
00508     { return implicit_cast( static_cast<element_type*>(p) ); }
00509 
00510 };
00511 
00512 template< typename T, typename MT >
00513 class sc_vector_assembly
00514 {
00515   template< typename U > friend class sc_vector;
00516 
00517 public:
00518 
00519   typedef sc_vector<T> base_type;
00520 
00521   typedef sc_vector_iter< T, sc_member_access<T, MT> >          iterator;
00522   typedef sc_vector_iter< const T
00523                         , sc_member_access<const T, const MT> > const_iterator;
00524 
00525   typedef T  element_type;
00526   typedef MT access_type;
00527 
00528   typedef typename base_type::size_type       size_type;
00529   typedef typename base_type::difference_type difference_type;
00530   typedef typename iterator::reference        reference;
00531   typedef typename iterator::pointer          pointer;
00532   typedef typename const_iterator::reference  const_reference;
00533   typedef typename const_iterator::pointer    const_pointer;
00534 
00535 
00536   typedef access_type (T::*member_type);
00537 
00538   const char* name() const { return vec_->name(); }
00539   const char* kind() const { return "sc_vector_assembly"; }
00540 
00541   iterator begin()
00542     { return iterator( (*vec_).begin().it_, ptr_ ); }
00543   iterator end()
00544     { return iterator( (*vec_).end().it_, ptr_ ); }
00545 
00546   const_iterator cbegin() const
00547     { return const_iterator( (*vec_).cbegin().it_, ptr_ ); }
00548   const_iterator cend() const
00549     { return const_iterator( (*vec_).cend().it_, ptr_ ); }
00550 
00551   const_iterator begin() const
00552     { return const_iterator( (*vec_).begin().it_, ptr_ ); }
00553   const_iterator end()   const
00554     { return const_iterator( (*vec_).end().it_, ptr_ ); }
00555 
00556   size_type size() const { return vec_->size(); }
00557   const std::vector< sc_object* > & get_elements() const;
00558 
00559   reference operator[]( size_type idx )
00560     { return (*vec_)[idx].*ptr_; }
00561   reference at( size_type idx )
00562     { return vec_->at(idx).*ptr_; }
00563   const_reference operator[]( size_type idx ) const
00564     { return (*vec_)[idx].*ptr_; }
00565   const_reference at( size_type idx ) const
00566     { return vec_->at(idx).*ptr_; }
00567 
00568   template< typename ContainerType, typename ArgumentType >
00569   iterator bind( sc_vector_assembly<ContainerType,ArgumentType> c )
00570     { return bind( c.begin(), c.end() ); }
00571 
00572   template< typename BindableContainer >
00573   iterator bind( BindableContainer & c )
00574     { return bind( c.begin(), c.end() ); }
00575 
00576   template< typename BindableIterator >
00577   iterator bind( BindableIterator first, BindableIterator last )
00578     { return bind( first, last, this->begin() ); }
00579 
00580   template< typename BindableIterator >
00581   iterator bind( BindableIterator first, BindableIterator last
00582                , iterator from )
00583     { return sc_vector_do_bind( *this, first, last, from ); }
00584 
00585   template< typename BindableIterator >
00586   iterator bind( BindableIterator first, BindableIterator last
00587                , typename base_type::iterator from )
00588     { return bind( first, last, iterator(from.it_, ptr_) ); }
00589 
00590   template< typename ContainerType, typename ArgumentType >
00591   iterator operator()( sc_vector_assembly<ContainerType,ArgumentType> c )
00592     { return operator()( c.begin(), c.end() ); }
00593 
00594   template< typename ArgumentContainer >
00595   iterator operator()( ArgumentContainer & c )
00596     { return operator()( c.begin(), c.end() ); }
00597 
00598   template< typename ArgumentIterator >
00599   iterator operator()( ArgumentIterator first, ArgumentIterator last )
00600     { return operator()( first, last, this->begin() ); }
00601 
00602   template< typename ArgumentIterator >
00603   iterator operator()( ArgumentIterator first, ArgumentIterator last
00604                      , iterator from )
00605     { return sc_vector_do_operator_paren( *this, first, last, from ); }
00606 
00607   template< typename ArgumentIterator >
00608   iterator operator()( ArgumentIterator first, ArgumentIterator last
00609                      , typename base_type::iterator from )
00610     { return operator()( first, last, iterator(from.it_, ptr_) ); }
00611 
00612   sc_vector_assembly( const sc_vector_assembly & other )
00613     : vec_( other.vec_ )
00614     , ptr_( other.ptr_ )
00615     , child_vec_(0)
00616   {}
00617 
00618   sc_vector_assembly& operator=( sc_vector_assembly other_copy )
00619   {
00620     swap( other_copy );
00621     return *this;
00622   }
00623 
00624   void swap( sc_vector_assembly & that )
00625   {
00626     using std::swap;
00627     swap( vec_,       that.vec_ );
00628     swap( ptr_,       that.ptr_ );
00629     swap( child_vec_, that.child_vec_ );
00630   }
00631 
00632   void report_empty_bind( const char* kind_, bool dst_empty_ ) const
00633     { vec_->report_empty_bind( kind_, dst_empty_ ); }
00634 
00635   ~sc_vector_assembly()
00636     { delete child_vec_; }
00637 
00638 private:
00639 
00640   sc_vector_assembly( base_type & v, member_type ptr )
00641     : vec_(&v)
00642     , ptr_(ptr)
00643     , child_vec_(0)
00644   {}
00645 
00646   sc_object* object_cast( pointer p ) const
00647     { return vec_->implicit_cast( p ); }
00648 
00649   base_type * vec_;
00650   member_type ptr_;
00651 
00652   mutable std::vector< sc_object* >* child_vec_;
00653 };
00654 
00655 template< typename T, typename MT >
00656 sc_vector_assembly<T,MT>
00657 sc_assemble_vector( sc_vector<T> & vec, MT (T::*ptr) )
00658 {
00659   return vec.assemble( ptr );
00660 }
00661 
00662 template< typename T >
00663 typename sc_vector<T>::element_type *
00664 sc_vector<T>::create_element( const char* name, size_type /* idx */ )
00665 {
00666   return new T( name );
00667 }
00668 
00669 template< typename T >
00670 template< typename Creator >
00671 void
00672 sc_vector<T>::init( size_type n, Creator c )
00673 {
00674   if ( base_type::check_init(n) )
00675   {
00676     // restore SystemC hierarchy context, if needed
00677     sc_vector_base::context_scope scope( this );
00678 
00679     base_type::reserve( n );
00680     try
00681     {
00682       for ( size_type i = 0; i<n; ++i )
00683       {
00684         // this workaround is needed for SystemC 2.2/2.3 sc_bind
00685         std::string  name  = make_name( basename(), i );
00686         const char*  cname = name.c_str();
00687 
00688         element_type* p = c( cname, i ) ; // call Creator
00689         base_type::push_back(p);
00690       }
00691     }
00692     catch ( ... )
00693     {
00694       clear();
00695       throw;
00696     }
00697   }
00698 }
00699 
00700 template< typename T >
00701 void
00702 sc_vector<T>::clear()
00703 {
00704   size_type i = size();
00705   while ( i --> 0 )
00706   {
00707     delete &( (*this)[i] );
00708   }
00709   base_type::clear();
00710 }
00711 
00712 template< typename Container, typename ArgumentIterator >
00713 typename Container::iterator
00714 sc_vector_do_bind( Container & cont
00715                  , ArgumentIterator  first
00716                  , ArgumentIterator  last
00717                  , typename Container::iterator from )
00718 {
00719   typename Container::iterator end = cont.end();
00720 
00721   if( !cont.size() || from == end || first == last )
00722       cont.report_empty_bind( cont.kind(), from == end );
00723 
00724   while( from!=end && first != last )
00725     (*from++).bind( *first++ );
00726   return from;
00727 }
00728 
00729 template< typename Container, typename ArgumentIterator >
00730 typename Container::iterator
00731 sc_vector_do_operator_paren( Container& cont
00732                            , ArgumentIterator  first
00733                            , ArgumentIterator  last
00734                            , typename Container::iterator from )
00735 {
00736   typename Container::iterator end = cont.end();
00737 
00738   if( !cont.size() || from == end || first == last )
00739       cont.report_empty_bind( cont.kind(), from == end );
00740 
00741   while( from!=end && first != last )
00742     (*from++)( *first++ );
00743   return from;
00744 }
00745 
00746 template< typename T >
00747 sc_vector<T>::~sc_vector()
00748 {
00749   clear();
00750 }
00751 
00752 template< typename T, typename MT >
00753 std::vector< sc_object* > const &
00754 sc_vector_assembly<T,MT>::get_elements() const
00755 {
00756   if( !child_vec_ )
00757     child_vec_ = new std::vector< sc_object* >;
00758 
00759   if( child_vec_->size() || !size() )
00760     return *child_vec_;
00761 
00762   child_vec_->reserve( size() );
00763   for( const_iterator it=begin(); it != end(); ++it )
00764     if( sc_object * obj = object_cast( const_cast<MT*>(&*it) ) )
00765       child_vec_->push_back( obj );
00766 
00767   return *child_vec_;
00768 }
00769 
00770 } // namespace sc_core
